articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Message of Greeting from Chinese Leaders
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Message of Greeting from Chinese Leaders
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, and Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, received a message of greeting from Xi Jinping, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, Li Keqiang, premier of the State Council, and Zhang Dejiang, chairman of the Standing Committee of the Chinese National People's Congress, on Monday.
					 The message says:
					
					 We extend warm congratulations to the WPK and government and people of the DPRK on behalf of the CPC, government and people of China on the occasion of the 66th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 For the past 66 years after the foundation of the DPRK, the Korean people have steadily registered fresh successes in the socialist revolution and construction under the leadership of the WPK.
					
					 We sincerely wish the Korean people fresh and bigger successes in the economic and social development of the country in future.
					
					 The traditional Sino-DPRK friendship is the precious asset common to the two countries and peoples as it was provided and cultivated by the leaders of the elder generations of the two countries with all their heart and soul.
					
					 We will steadily consolidate and boost the bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation together with the DPRK side under the new situation and thus bring the welfare to the two countries and peoples and make a positive contribution to the prosperity, development, peace and stability in the region.
					
					 We wish the DPRK prosperity and its people happiness.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Russian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Russian President
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from V. Putin, president of the Russian Federation, on Tuesday.
					 The message said:
					
					 I extend sincere congratulations to you on the occasion of the 66th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 The relations between our two countries are traditionally developing on the principle of friendship, mutual respect and good neighborliness.
					
					 I express belief that the constructive cooperation will as ever grow positively in all fields by our joint efforts.
					
					 This will meet the fundamental interests of the peoples of our two countries and contribute to ensuring the peace, security and stability on the Korean peninsula and in the rest of Northeast Asia.
					
					 I wish you good health and success and all the people of the DPRK happiness and wellbeing.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Greetings from Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Greetings from Raul Castro Ruz
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Raul Castro Ruz, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba, on Tuesday.
					 The message said:
					
					 I, on behalf of the party, government and people of Cuba, extend sincere congratulations to you on the occasion of the 66th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 Please accept my greetings of solidarity.

articles.title: Greeting to Kim Jong Un from President of Palestine
articles.content:
Greeting to Kim Jong Un from President of Palestine
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Mahmoud Abbas, president of the State of Palestine and chairman of the Executive Committee of the Palestine Liberation Organization, on Tuesday.
					 The message said:
					
					 I deem it happiness to extend the warmest congratulations and sincerest wish to Your Excellency and the friendly people of the DPRK on behalf of the people of the State of Palestine and on my own behalf, on the occasion of the 66th founding anniversary of your DPRK and wish your friendly country stability and prosperity.
					
					 We are very thankful to Your Excellency for having expressed solidarity with the Palestinian people in the whole period of their struggle for freedom and independence and supported us at all international arenas.
					
					 We are proud of the historical relations of friendship and bonds of mutual respect between the two countries and convinced that these relations will grow stronger in their common interests.
					
					 Extending the warmest congratulations to Your Excellency, I sincerely wish Your Excellency good health and happiness.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Organizations
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Organizations
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un received messages of greetings from organizations of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on the occasion of the 66th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 They included the Standing Council of the Korean Federation of Workers in Commerce in Japan, the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, the Central Standing Management Board of Korean Youth Commercial Association in Japan, the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Teachers in Japan, the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Central Educational Association in Japan, the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Scientists and Technologists Association in Japan, the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Social Scientists Association in Japan, the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Sportsmen's Federation in Japan, the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Writers and Artists in Japan, the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Medical Association in Japan, the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Students in Japan, t he Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification, the Central Standing Council of the Korean Human Rights Association in Japan and other Chongryon organizations and its affiliated organizations, the Choson Sinbo Company, the Korean News Service, the Hagu Bookshop, the Kumgang-san Opera Troupe, the Korean Goods Sales Company, Kumgang Insurance Company, the Committee for Promoting Korea-Japan Economic Exchange, the Federation of Joint Economic Venture of Korean Residents in Japan, the Center for Consulting Marriage of Korean Youth in Japan, Korean Press Hall in Tokyo and various other enteprerises, local headquarters of Chongryon, Korean University and Korean schools at various levels.
					
					 The messages said the founding of the DPRK marked an event of great significance in the history of the nation as it declared the birth of an independent power with people as its masters for the first time in the history of the nation spanning 5 000 years.
					
					 Officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan are fully determined to usher in a new heyday of Chongryon in the glorious era of Kim Jong Un and thus exalt the honor of being a model in the Juche-based overseas compatriots' movement and an ardent patriotic forerunner sharing destiny with the socialist homeland, the messages added.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Japanese Delegation
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Japanese Delegation
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from the visiting Yamanashi Prefectural delegation for Japan-DPRK friendship on the occasion of the 66th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The floral basket was handed over to an official concerned on Tuesday by head of the delegation Yasunobu Kanemaru, president of the Television Yamanashi Co., Ltd.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Central Standing Committee of Chongryon
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Central Standing Committee of Chongryon
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory message from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on Tuesday, the 66th birthday of the DPRK.
					 The message said the DPRK founded by President Kim Il Sung and developed by leader Kim Jong Il is a genuine people's country, an independent socialist state and an invincible Paektusan power that wins victories and demonstrates its might by dint of Songun.
					
					 As there is the motherland which sheds its rays thanks to the undying exploits of the peerless great men, the Koreans in Japan could protect the dignity of the nation and demonstrate its honor as an example of the overseas compatriots' movement in the world despite difficulties in the alien land, the message noted.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, who has led the DPRK to become an invincible power pervaded with the revolutionary spirit of Mt. Paektu and ushered in a fresh heyday of victory and prosperity, is the great leader of Chongryon and the immensely tender-hearted teacher of the Koreans in Japan, the message added.
					
					 It renewed the pledge to thoroughly carry out the behests of the President and Kim Jong Il, following the road indicated by Kim Jong Un and usher without fail in the new heyday of Chongryon in the glorious era Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks DPRK's Birthday
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks DPRK's Birthday
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the April 25 House of Culture here Tuesday to mark the 66th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Ri Yong Gil, Hyon Yong Chol and other senior party, state and army officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, members of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly (SPA), deputies to the SPA, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, labor innovators, bereaved family members of revolutionary martyrs and working people in Pyongyang.
					
					 Also present there were Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, Ryang Su Jong, advisor of the Korean Federation of Workers in Commerce in Japan, the congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the 66th founding anniversary of the DPRK, delegations, visiting groups of overseas Koreans and other compatriots staying in the homeland and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Present there on invitation were foreign diplomatic envoys, representatives of international bodies and military attaches of foreign embassies here and foreign guests.
					
					 Pak Pong Ju, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and premier of the DPRK Cabinet, made a report.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung declared before the world the founding of the DPRK on September 9, Juche 37 (1948) on the basis of the precious experience gained in the building of the people's power in the flames of the anti-Japanese revolution and the firm foundation laid in the building of the country after its liberation, the reporter said, and went on:
					
					 The history of the DPRK is a sacred course along which it developed into an independent socialist state under the leadership of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They regarded independence as lifeline in the whole period of leading the revolution and led the DPRK to solve all issues arising in the revolution and construction by the efforts of the Koreans in conformity with the actual conditions of the country and interests of the Korean revolution, invariably adhering to the principle of independence in politics, self-sustenance in the economy and self-reliance in national defence.
					
					 They made sure that all the lines, policies and activities of the DPRK were thoroughly implemented to defend the interests and requirements of the people and provide the people with an independent and creative life.
					
					 They paid a particular attention to providing the DPRK with a firm political, military and economic guarantee for creditably performing its duty as a powerful weapon for accomplishing the cause of Juche with a noble sense of mission to protect the destiny of the country.
					
					 They regarded the single-minded unity as a mainstay for the revolution and consolidated in every way the unity of the revolutionary ranks in thinking and purpose, morality and sense of obligation, thus laying a firm socio-political foundation of the DPRK.
					
					 In the whole period of leading the revolution they considered the military affair as the most important state affair and exerted all efforts for bolstering up the defence capability.
					
					 They built strong self-supporting national economy so that the Korean people could enjoy happiness and wellbeing in the thriving socialist nation for all eternity.
					
					 Under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un the DPRK is advancing straight along the road of independence, Songun and socialism indicated by the President and Kim Jong Il while thoroughly implementing their behests without an inch of deflection and the slightest concession and settling all the issues arising in the revolution and construction the way the President and Kim Jong Il did.
					
					 As clarified in the statement of the government of the DPRK, it will make our every effort to weather the difficulties facing the nation, mend the north-south relations and open up a new phase for independent reunification, and carry out without fail the last instructions of the President and Kim Jong Il for national reunification.
					
					 The government of the DPRK will as ever remain true to the idea of its foreign policy-- independence, peace and friendship-- and boost the friendly and cooperative relations with all countries which respect its sovereignty and are friendly towards it and make positive efforts for the global peace, security and prosperity common to mankind.

articles.title: Banquet Given to Celebrate DPRK's Birthday
articles.content:
Banquet Given to Celebrate DPRK's Birthday
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- A banquet took place at the People's Palace of Culture Tuesday, the 66th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and other leading officials of the party and state, the chairperson of a friendly party, deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly, officials of the armed forces and power bodies, the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, heroes, people of merit, the congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan, overseas compatriots and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Present there on invitation were diplomatic envoys representatives of international organizations and military attaches of foreign embassies here and their wives and other foreign guests.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, made a speech at the banquet.
					
					 He said that the history of the DPRK is the one of miracles in which the weak colonial country, once eclipsed in the world map, turned into an invincible power demonstrating its dignity before the world and the proud one in which it has paved a new road for nation-building in the era of independence.
					
					 He extended the highest tribute and eternal glory to President Kim Il Sung, founder of the DPRK, who built a genuine people's power, the first of its kind in the history of the nation spanning thousands of years, and leader Kim Jong Il who provided an eternal foundation for the country's eternal prosperity for all generations to come.
					
					 He noted that the DPRK government would regard it as its general goal to build an economic power and improve the people's standard of living, translate the beautiful dream and ideal of the people into a shining reality and thus make hurrah for the Workers' Party and socialism resound forth across the country for all ages.
					
					 He stressed that no force can block the dynamic advance of the great Paektusan nation full of conviction, making a leap forward with youthful vigor under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, and the DPRK will always emerge victorious.

articles.title: Senior Party, State and Army Officials Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Senior Party, State and Army Officials Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Senior party, state and army officials visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Tuesday, the 66th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The visitors included Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and other leading officials of the party, state and army, the chairperson of a friendly party, deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly and officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions.
					
					 Laid before the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il was a floral basket in the name of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A floral basket was laid before the statues in the joint name of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the WPK Central Military Commission, the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the DPRK Cabinet.
					
					 The participants paid tribute to the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 At the halls where Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state, the visitors made bows to them.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il received are preserved and the halls which house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign trips till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Foreign Guests and Overseas Compatriots Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Foreign Guests and Overseas Compatriots Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations, military attaches of foreign embassies here, the congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan and other foreign guests and overseas compatriots visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Tuesday, the 66th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 They paid tribute to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They paid homage to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il at the halls where they lie in state.
					
					 They looked round the halls where orders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il received are preserved and the halls that house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.
					
					 They made entries in the visitor's book.
					
					 That day the chief and staff members of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front visited the palace to pay homage to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Service personnel, people from all walks of life and school youth and children visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on the 66th birthday of the DPRK.
					 Seen before the statues was a floral basket from supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Laid before the statues were floral baskets in the name of party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, institutions, industrial establishments, farms and schools in Pyongyang, bouquets and flowers.
					
					 The Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front also placed a floral basket before the statues.
					
					 The visitors paid tribute to the statues.
					
					 Placed before the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il at Kim Il Sung University, Kim Il Sung Military University, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security, Mangyongdae Revolutionary School, the Mansudae Art Studio and portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in various places in Pyongyang were floral baskets in the name of units of the People's Army, institutions and enterprises, bouquets and flowers.
					
					 Servicepersons, working people, school youth and children across the country visited the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and mosaics depicting smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in their residential areas.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid before Martyrs Cemeteries
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid before Martyrs Cemeteriesun
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong, the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery and the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery on September 9, the 66th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Seen standing on the wreath-laying stands of the cemeteries were wreaths sent by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremonies were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Hyon Yong Chol and other senior party, state and army officials, chairman of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces (KPISF) and Pyongyangites.
					
					 Wreaths in the names of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the DPRK Cabinet were placed on the wreath-laying stand of the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong.
					
					 A wreath in the joint name of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the DPRK Cabinet was laid on the wreath-laying stand of the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery and a wreath in the joint name of the Central Committee of the WPK, the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the National Defence Commission of the DPRK on the wreath-laying stand "Soul of Heroes" of the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery.
					
					 Also placed there were wreaths in the name of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, working people's organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the KPA and the KPISF, organs of education, public health and media, and party and power organs, institutions, factories and farms in Pyongyang.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of the martyrs.
					
					 They looked round the cemeteries.

articles.title: Japanese Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Japanese Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The Yamanashi Prefectural delegation for Japan-DPRK friendship led by Yasunobu Kanemaru, president of the Television Yamanashi Co., Ltd. visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The guests went round historical relics preserved at the old home in Mangyongdae, being briefed on the revolutionary life of the President.
					
					 They toured revolutionary relics on Mangyong Hill.
					
					 The head of the delegation said that he toured Mangyongdae, the birthplace of the President, as part of the itinerary of his first visit to the DPRK. 
					
					 On various occasions and through press reports I was aware of what Mangyongdae visited by many people is like but today I had an opportunity to see for myself this place associated with touching historical facts, he added.
					
					 The delegation also visited the Munsu Water Park, the Rungna Dolphinarium, Panmunjom, etc.

articles.title: Art Performances Given to Mark Founding Anniversary of DPRK
articles.content:
Art Performances Given to Mark Founding Anniversary of DPRK
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- There took place art performances in Pyongyang and provinces to mark the 66th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 A dance performance "Pyongyang Is Best" was given by the Phibada Opera Troupe at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre here.
					
					 In such numbers as female group dance "Janggu Dance" the performers depicted the happy Korean people who are leading a worthwhile life, demonstrating the tradition and mettle of the nation in the country of Juche.
					
					 Revolutionary drama "Following the Banner of Victory" was staged at the National Theatre, a concert "Ode to the Motherland" was given by the National Symphony Orchestra at the Moranbong Theatre and acrobatic pieces staged by the National Circus at the Pyongyang Circus Theatre to mark the 66th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 Art performances were also given in various parts of the country including North Phyongan and Hwanghae, Jagang and South Hamgyong provinces.
					
					 An art performance was given by members of the 922 Construction Shock Brigade at the construction site of the stockbreeding base in Sepho Area.

articles.title: Stamp Show of Philatelists of DPRK and Russia Opens
articles.content:
Stamp Show of Philatelists of DPRK and Russia Opens
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- A stamp show of philatelists of the DPRK and Russia opened with due ceremony at the Korean Stamp Museum on Tuesday under the co-sponsorship of the Korean Union of Philatelists and the Russian National Philatelists Academy to mark the 66th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Displayed at the venue of the show was a photo reflecting the stamp depicting President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 On display there were stamps dealing with the history, culture and present development of the DPRK and Russia including the stamps on Pyongyang and Moscow collected by philatelists of the two countries.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Kim Yong Gil, chairman of the Korean Union of Philatelists, Kim Jin Bom, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and chairman of the DPRK-Russia Friendship Association, officials concerned, working people and philatelists in the city.
					
					 Also present there were members of the delegation of the Russian National Philatelists Academy headed by President Andrei Strygin, Igor Sagitov, minister-councilor and staff members of the Russian embassy and staff members of various other embassies here.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Speakers said the show opened amid the expectation and interests of the two countries and it would offer an opportunity of deepening the history of friendship between the two countries.
					
					 They noted that the two countries have conducted exchange and cooperation in the field of stamp from long ago.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony the participants went round stamps on display.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- There took place dancing parties of youth and students in various parts to mark the 66th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Cheerful dancing parties started to the tune of the song "O Korea, You Are Shedding Rays All Over World" in such venues here as the plazas of the Arch of Triumph, the Monument to Party Founding and the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium.
					
					 The participants danced to the tune of such songs as "Fly Our Tri-color National Flag of the Republic" and "We Sing of Our Country Holding the Leader in High Esteem", recollecting the nation-building exploits of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 They also cheerfully danced to the tune of such songs as "People Will Live Long under His Care" and "This Is Thanks to the Songun Politics of General". One could read on the faces of the dancers their profound reverence for leader Kim Jong Il who laid an eternal foundation for the prosperity of Songun Korea. 
					
					 The festive atmosphere picked up when such songs as "Train to the Front", "Dash ahead for Future" and "Let's Defend Socialism" were played.
					
					 Similar dancing parties took place in provincial seats, cities and counties that day.

articles.title: Early Apples Sent to University Teachers, Researchers
articles.content:
Early Apples Sent to University Teachers, Researchers
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Teachers and researchers of the leading universities in Pyongyang received early apples from Kwail County, South Hwanghae Province on the occasion of the founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Officials and other working people of the county sent trucks with full loads of early apples to Pyongyang. 
					
					 Officials, teachers, researchers and students of Pyongyang greeted the fleet of those trucks early Monday morning.
					
					 The teachers and researchers of Kim Il Sung University, Kim Hyong Jik University of Education, Kim Chaek University of Technology, Pyongyang University of Architecture, Pyongyang University of Mechanical Engineering and other universities were greatly excited to receive the fruits associated with the warm loving care of the leader.

articles.title: DPRK Wrestler Bags Gold Medal in World Championships
articles.content:
DPRK Wrestler Bags Gold Medal in World Championships
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- DPRK wrestler Yang Kyong Il bagged a gold medal in the men's 57kg freestyle category of the 2014 World Wrestling Championships.
					 The championships have been under way in Tashkent, Uzbekistan since September 8. They brought together over 700 men and women ace wrestlers from at least 80 countries and regions including the DPRK.
					
					 He beat his south Korean rival in 16 superstar tournament on Monday. In the quarter-finals he trounced his Japanese rival. In the semi-finals he defeated his Iranian rival.
					
					 He beat his Georgian rival in the finals, winning the world title.
					
					 He was awarded at an awarding ceremony.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Defender of DPRK's Dignity and Sovereignty
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Defender of DPRK's Dignity and Sovereignty
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- On the National Day (September 9), people in the DPRK are recollecting with deep emotion the undying feats President Kim Il Sung performed in defending the national dignity and sovereignty.
					 In the early 1950s, the U.S. unleashed a war of aggression against the two-year old DPRK in a bid to stamp out it. Soon after the signing of the Armistice Agreement, the U.S. launched military provocations against the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. decades-long hostile policy toward the DPRK had constantly strained the situation of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 But the DPRK firmly defended its dignity and sovereignty under the leadership of Kim Il Sung, winning victories one after another in the fierce face-off with the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces.
					
					 When the Korean People's Army captured the U.S. armed spy ship Pueblo, the U.S. brought the situation to the brink of war, The President declared the DPRK's stand that it would react to the U.S. retaliation with retaliation and to an all-out war with an all-out war.
					
					 The DPRK's toughest stance forced the U.S. to sign a letter of apology 11 months after the Pueblo incident. Former U.S. President Johnson deplored that it was one and the only letter of apology signed by the U.S. in its history.
					
					 Later, the KPA shot down a U.S. large-sized spy plane EC-121, when it intruded into the territorial air of the DPRK, and frustrated a wave of war provocations the U.S. forces committed in the Demilitarized Zone.
					
					 In the 1990s when the U.S. launched Team Spirit 93 joint military exercises, Kim Il Sung saw to it that the DPRK declared a state of semi-war, announcing its withdrawal from the Non-proliferation Treaty (NPT) in the face of the U.S. gangster-like demand for "ad-hoc inspection" of its nuclear facilities.
					
					 Thanks to his wise guidance, the DPRK could fully display its might as a military power, smashing the U.S. ceaseless war moves in the 20th century.

articles.title: Papers Editorially Observe Birthday of DPRK
articles.content:
Papers Editorially Observe Birthday of DPRK
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Papers Tuesday carry editorials to mark the 66th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Rodong Sinmun says that the foundation of the DPRK marked a historic event as it gave a new origin to the building of a genuine country of the people based on the Juche idea and an independent power.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The DPRK has protected the dignity and happiness of the people and brought them into bloom, fully demonstrating the invincible spirit for the past several decades under the guidance of the great leaders and party. This is a proud tradition and great honor of the DPRK.
					
					 The permanent victory and prosperity of the DPRK can be guaranteed when we are dynamically advancing straight along the road of Juche, independence, Songun and socialism paved by the great men of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The more than 60 years covered by the DPRK shining with their ideas and august names represent a militant path along which the DPRK has turned into a socialist power of Juche, hewing out an untrodden road.
					
					 The DPRK has won one victory after another, holding high the banner of Juche under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. It is more powerfully demonstrating its dignity and might in the advance in the new century of Juche led by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The DPRK led by Kim Jong Un is a dignified country firmly adhering to the principle of independence and achieving prosperity, an invincible one defending the peace and security of the country with the might of Songun and genuine one of the people bringing the dream and ideal of the people into bloom, holding high the banner of socialism.
					
					 Minju Joson says that the revolutionary exploits performed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for building the country of the people and providing the eternal foundation for the happiness of the nation will shine forever along with the history of the DPRK, adding that the DPRK is ushering in a new heyday of the country's prosperity under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Romanian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Romanian Paper
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The gist of leader Kim Jong Il's work "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction" was carried by the September issue of the Romanian paper Romania Muncitoare.
					 The work, made public on June 19, Juche 86 (1997), clarifies the idea that it is the basic principle to be adhered to in accomplishing the socialist cause to preserve the Juche character and national character in the revolution and construction. It also indicates tasks and ways to do so.

articles.title: Italian Political Figure Praises DPRK
articles.content:
Italian Political Figure Praises DPRK
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Matteo Salvini, federal secretary of the Northern Federation of Italy, praised the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, when interviewed by a reporter after visiting it.
					 He said:
					
					 I did not miss the chance to visit the DPRK, prompted by my intention to witness its reality for myself without any prejudice.
					
					 There were not a few things in short supply for the Korean people.
					
					 However, it is a foolish act to slap sanctions against them.
					
					 The sanctions against the DPRK should be lifted.
					
					 All the people in the DPRK call their leader "respected Marshal".
					
					 The state provides the people with everything such as schools, houses and jobs.
					
					 It is not the American way of life only that prevails in the world.
					
					 I feel satisfied with my visit to the DPRK.
					
					 We witnessed a good spirit of collectivism there.
					
					 A lot of children were cheerfully playing in the streets, not in video game houses and all of them were respecting old people.
					
					 Such things are no longer to be seen in Italy.
					
					 We met a football player who recorded one page of history by beating the Italian team in the 1966 World Cup.
					
					 The September 3 issue of the Italian paper Corriere Della Sera carried the above-said story under the title "Salvini appreciates the DPRK as a country where a good spirit of collectivism prevails".

articles.title: British Organization Praises DPRK
articles.content:
British Organization Praises DPRK
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The Korean Friendship Association UK issued a statement on Sept. 3 on the occasion of the 66th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 September 9 is a significant day when President Kim Il Sung founded the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					
					 The DPRK is the most solid socialist state as it has dynamically advanced along the road of independence, invariably holding aloft the banner of socialism even at a time when some countries lowered it and strayed from the path of history.
					
					 The DPRK was a state of all Koreans founded through the all-Korea general elections in 1948 reflecting even the will of the people in south Korea whereas the south Korean regime was a puppet regime illegally installed at the barrel of a gun by the U.S.
					
					 The DPRK is enforcing popular policies such as free healthcare and free education despite the harsh blockade and sanctions by the hostile forces.
					
					 It is dynamically advancing towards independence and prosperity under the Songun revolutionary leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un carrying forward the intentions of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: DPRK's Birthday Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
DPRK's Birthday Celebrated in Different Countries
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Events took place in Vietnam, Romania, Bulgaria and Finland from Sept. 2 to 4 on the occasion of the 66th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Displayed on the front walls of the venues were portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Also on display there were works of the peerless great men of Mt. Paektu and books and photos introducing the shining achievements made by the DPRK in building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Pham Tat Dong, chairman of the Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Association, said that the founding of the DPRK was the fruition of staunch and heroic struggle waged by the Korean people under the guidance of Kim Il Sung and an event of weighty significance which opened a new chapter in the history of the Korean nation.
					
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, noted that the protracted course of the development of the DPRK serves as a precious example to be followed by the world progressives aspiring after socialism.
					
					 The chairman of the Bulgarian Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification stressed that the history of the DPRK is closely linked with the revolutionary history of Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea and its eternal President, Kim Jong Il, eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, and Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Korean people.
					
					 Antti Sika Aho, chairman of the Finland-Korea Society, said that the DPRK which was built by Kim Il Sung and turned into an invincible socialist state by Kim Jong Il is the beacon of hope for the world progressives advocating independence.
					
					 Messages of greeting to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the meetings held in Bulgaria and Finland.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de dirigentes de partido y estado de China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de dirigentes de partido y estado de China
Pyongyang, 9 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, recibio junto con el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, y el primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros, Pak Pong Ju,  un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviaran el dia 8 Xi Jinping, Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China, Li Keqiang, primer ministro del Consejo de Estado, y Zhang Dejiang, presidente del Comite Permanente de la Asamblea Popular Nacional.
					El texto sigue:
					
					Con motivo del 66o aniversario de la fundacion de la RPDC, enviamos en representacion del Partido Comunista de China, el gobierno y el pueblo chinos las calurosas felicitaciones a ustedes y, por su conducto, al PTC, el gobierno y el pueblo coreanos.
					
					Durante los 66 anos que datan de la fundacion de la RPDC, el pueblo coreano alcanzo incesantes y nuevos exitos en la revolucion socialista y la causa de construccion bajo la direccion del PTC.
					
					Deseamos de todo corazon que el pueblo coreano siga logrando nuevos y mayores exitos en el desarrollo economico y social del pais.
					
					La tradicional amistad China-Corea es el valioso patrimonio comun de los dos paises y sus pueblos porque ha sido establecida y desarrollada por los lideres de generacion veterana de ambos paises.
					
					Bajo nuevas circunstancias, consolidaremos y fortaleceremos sin parar con la parte coreana las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre nuestros dos paises para dar bienestar a nuestros dos paises y a sus pueblos y contribuir mucho a la prosperidad, desarrollo, paz y estabilidad de la region.
					
					Formulamos votos por la prosperidad de la RPDC y la felicidad de su pueblo.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe felicitaciones del presidente ruso
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe felicitaciones del presidente ruso
Pyongyang, 9 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Jong Un, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el dia 9 el Presidente de la Federacion Rusa, V. Putin. 
					La misiva senala:
					
					En ocasion del 66o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, quisiera extenderle a Vd. mis sinceras felicitaciones. 
					
					Las relaciones entre nuestros dos paises se desarrollan tradicionalmente en el principio de amistad, respeto mutuo y buena vecindad. 
					
					Expreso la conviccion de que gracias a nuestros esfuerzos conjuntos, se ampliara y se desarrollara en el futuro tambien la cooperacion constructiva en todos los dominios. 
					
					Esto conviene a los intereses fundamentales de los pueblos de nuestros dos paises y contribuira a preservar la paz, la seguridad y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del Nordeste Asiatico. 
					
					Le deseo a Vd. buena salud y exitos y a todo el pueblo de la RPDC, felicidad y bienestar.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de Raul Castro
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de Raul Castro
Pyongyang, 9 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Jong Un, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el dia 9 Raul Castro Ruz, Primer Secretario del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Cuba y Presidente de los Consejos de Estado y de Ministros de la Republica de Cuba.
					El remitente extendio sinceras felicitaciones al destinatario con motivo del 66o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en nombre del partido, el gobierno y el pueblo de Cuba, y le dirigio saludo de solidaridad.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion del presidente palestino
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion del presidente palestino
Pyongyang, 9 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Jong Un, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el dia 9 el Presidente del Estado de Palestina y del Comite Ejecutivo de la Organizacion de Liberacion Palestina, Mahmoud Abbas. 
					El texto senala:
					
					Con motivo del dia de fundacion de la RPDC, tengo el honor de expresar a Su Excelencia y al amistoso pueblo coreano las mas calidas felicitaciones y sincero saludo en nombre del pueblo del Estado de Palestina y en el mio propio y deseo a su pais amistoso la estabilidad y la prosperidad. 
					
					Estamos agradecidos de Vd. que expresa la solidaridad durante todo el periodo de la lucha del pueblo palestino por la libertad y la independencia y nos apoya en todos los escenarios internacionales. 
					
					Estamos orgullosos de las historicas relaciones de amistad y los lazos de respeto mutuo existentes entre los dos paises y convencidos de que esos vinculos se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran mas en lo adelante conforme a los intereses comunes. 
					
					Le extiendo a Su Excelencia mis mas calidas felicitaciones y le deseo de todo corazon buena salud y felicidad.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Chongryon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Chongryon
Pyongyang, 9 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el dia 9 el Presidium del Comite Central de la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon (Chongryon) con motivo del 66o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					La misiva senala que la RPDC, fundada por el Presidente Kim Il Sung y desarrollada por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, es un pais verdadero del pueblo, Estado socialista independiente y potencia del monte Paektu que logra victorias en virtud de la politica de Songun.
					
					Subraya que gracias a la patria que brilla con las proezas de los grandes hombres sin pares del monte Paektu, los coreanos residentes en Japon pudieron defender la dignidad nacional, llevar una vida digna y mantener el orgullo de modelo del movimiento de los coreanos residentes en ultramar a pesar de las condiciones dificiles del extranjero.
					
					Elogia al Mariscal, quien abre la nueva era dorada de victorias y prosperidad de la RPDC, donde reina el espiritu revolucionario del Paektu, como gran dirigente de Chongryon y maestro de los coreanos residentes en Japon.
					
					Patentiza la decision de materializar sin falta los legados de los Generalisimos siguiendo la senda indicada por el Mariscal y abrir sin falta una nueva era dorada de la Chongryon en la orgullosa epoca de Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe cesto de flores de delegacion japonesa
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe cesto de flores de delegacion japonesa
Pyongyang, 9 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio un cesto de flores que le dedicara la delegacion del Departamento de Yamanashi para la Amistad Japon-Corea, de visita en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea con motivo del 66o aniversario de la fundacion de la RPDC.
					El jefe de la delegacion, Yasunobu Kanemaru, presidente de la Compania Limitada de Television Yamanashi, lo traslado el dia 9 a un funcionario coreano.

articles.title: Yang Kyong Il se corona campeon mundial
articles.content:
Yang Kyong Il se corona campeon mundial
Pyongyang, 9 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El jugador de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Yang Kyong Il, conquisto la medalla de oro en la division de 57 kg de lucha libre del Campeonato Mundial de Lucha 2014.
					En el campeonato, iniciado el dia 8 en Tashkent, Uzbekistan, compiten mas de 700 jugadores sobresalientes de ambos sexos provenientes de mas de 80 paises y regiones incluso la RPDC.
					
					Yang vencio el dia 8 a su rival surcoreano en los octavos de final, al japones en los cuartos de final y al irani en la semifinal.
					
					En la final se corono campeon mundial al doblegar al otro finalista georgiano.
					
					En la ceremonia de premiacion fue otorgada la medalla de oro al jugador coreano.
